title: 1970 - Brother, Cry For Me - UNCENSORED VERSION

sources.description:
Three brothers. One jungle jackpot. Zero chill.
After their estranged father leaves a cryptic map to a hidden fortune from an Aztec pyramid, brothers Geoffrey, Jim, and Michael Noble race to the far away Boca Nueva jungle with Jenny caught in the crossfire. Realizing that they each have a stake in their fatherâ€™s fortune, the brothers become competitive. As the hunt heats up, shifting alliances spark a cascade of doubleâ€‘crosses, desperate grabs, and pulseâ€‘pounding showdowns amid ancient ruins.
